title: Yum or Yuck

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• In this game, the switch user can create a fake snack that is as yummy or yucky as they like. They choose the ingredients to go in their sandwich, ice cream or salad.
• Record "yum" on one switch and "yuck" on the other.
• Hold up two play items, one yummy and one yucky e.g. a tasty piece of cheese and a yucky toy spider.
• Ask the switch user "shall we put the yummy cheese on our sandwich or the yucky spider?!"
• If the switch user presses the "yum" switch, add the yummy item to their snack.
• If they press the "yuck" switch, add the yucky item instead.

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to create a fake snack that is as yummy or yucky as they like.
